lines.text: Thass the way to git money - Git education an' be a fight promotah.
Did you poke that little kid in the snoot?
Sure I did - what of it?
Y' sure walloped him a beaut, didn'tcha?
You're like papa - All you do is brag an' crow
I betcha if I was a boy I'd fight you both!
One minnit, gen'lemen - The champeens is still trainin'.
Keep yo' eye peeled fo' rough stuff.
La-dees an' gen'lemen - Interducin' 'Knockout' Mickey th' 'Irish Jiant'!... An' in this corner - 'Terribul' Jackie th' 'Bone Krusher'!
